data.name: "Fire-and-forget" support for long-running tasks (like emails or AI), featuring a GUI for queue management, parallel processing, and cancellation.
data.value: 「即發即忘」支援長時間執行的任務（例如電郵或人工智能），具備圖形使用者介面以管理佇列、平行處理及取消功能。

data.name: A built-in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system for fine-grained permission management.
data.value: 內建的角色權限存取控制（RBAC）系統，支援細緻的權限管理。

data.name: A complete solution for user authentication and profile management right out of the box.
data.value: 即裝即用的用戶身分驗證及個人資料管理完整方案

data.name: A complete solution for user authentication and profile management.
data.value: 一套完整的用戶驗證及個人資料管理方案

data.name: A fully responsive layout that looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.
data.value: 一個完全響應式的佈局，無論在桌面還是流動裝置上都能呈現優美的外觀。

data.name: A modern, feature-rich, and highly extensible foundation for your next web application.
data.value: 一個現代、功能豐富且高度可擴展的基礎，為您的下一個網頁應用程式提供支援。

data.name: AI-Powered Translations
data.value: AI驅動翻譯

data.name: All dependencies are automatically registered and always available via constructor injection.
data.value: 所有相依項目均會自動註冊，並可透過建構函式注入隨時使用。

data.name: Automatic Dark Mode
data.value: 自動深色模式

data.name: Automatic Dependency Injection
data.value: 自動依賴注入

data.name: Automatic Time Zone Handling
data.value: 自動時間區處理

data.name: Automatic, AI-driven translation into 28 languages for global reach.
data.value: 自動、由人工智能驅動的翻譯，支援 28 種語言，拓展全球影響力。

data.name: Automatic, AI-driven translation into 28 languages.
data.value: 自動化、由人工智能驅動的 28 種語言翻譯。

data.name: Background Job Processing
data.value: 背景工作處理

data.name: Built-in User Management
data.value: 內建用戶管理

data.name: Comes with Docker support for simplified and consistent deployments.
data.value: 內建 Docker 支援，簡化並統一部署流程。

data.name: Comes with full Docker support for simplified, consistent, and reliable deployments.
data.value: 內建完整 Docker 支援，讓部署更簡化、一致及可靠。

data.name: Comprehensive Documentation
data.value: 全面的文件

data.name: Consistency Validation
data.value: 一致性驗證

data.name: Develop exclusively in UTC while the system automatically converts and displays dates in the user's local time zone.
data.value: 以 UTC 為唯一開發時區，系統會自動將日期轉換並顯示為使用者的本地時間。

data.name: Dockerized for Deployment
data.value: Docker化以供部署

data.name: Dockerized for Easy Deployment
data.value: Docker化以簡化部署

data.name: Dynamic Navigation Bar
data.value: 動態導航列

data.name: Easily switch between database providers, including SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, and an in-memory database for testing.
data.value: 輕鬆切換不同的資料庫提供者，包括 SQLite、MySQL、SQL Server，以及用於測試的記憶體資料庫。

data.name: Easily switch between providers like SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, and an in-memory database for testing.
data.value: 輕鬆切換至 SQLite、MySQL、SQL Server 等資料庫提供者，以及用於測試的記憶體資料庫。

data.name: Effortlessly write integration tests using in-memory databases, temporary file systems, built-in mocking, and real-world HTTP request simulation.
data.value: 輕鬆編寫整合測試，使用記憶體資料庫、暫存檔案系統、內建模擬功能，以及真實世界的 HTTP 請求模擬。

data.name: Features a built-in file management system with automatic avatar compression and privacy protection.
data.value: 具備內建檔案管理系統，支援自動頭像壓縮及私隱保護。

data.name: Features a built-in file management system with automatic avatar compression.
data.value: 內建檔案管理系統，支援自動頭像壓縮。

data.name: Handle recurring jobs like cleanup and synchronization with a comprehensive GUI for monitoring execution history and logs.
data.value: 處理重複執行的工作，例如清理和同步，並透過全面的圖形使用者介面監控執行歷史記錄和日誌。

data.name: Hello World!
data.value: 你好世界！

data.name: Includes extensive documentation and practical examples to get you started quickly.
data.value: 包含全面的文件及實用範例，讓您快速上手。

data.name: Integrated File Management
data.value: 整合式檔案管理

data.name: Models are validated on both client and server sides based on data annotations.
data.value: 模型會根據資料註解，在客戶端及伺服器端進行驗證。

data.name: Multiple Database Provider Support
data.value: 支援多個資料庫提供者

data.name: Multiple Database Support
data.value: 支援多資料庫

data.name: OpenID Connect Integration
data.value: OpenID Connect 集成

data.name: RBAC Authorization
data.value: 基於角色的存取控制

data.name: Read the document
data.value: 閱讀文件

data.name: Responsive Design
data.value: 響應式設計

data.name: Robust Integration Testing
data.value: 穩健的整合測試

data.name: Scheduled Task Management
data.value: 排程工作管理

data.name: Seamlessly integrate with any OpenID Connect provider, with automatic role synchronization.
data.value: 無縫整合任何 OpenID Connect 提供者，並自動同步角色。

data.name: Smart Configuration Overrides
data.value: 智能設定覆蓋

data.name: Smart dark mode that adapts to the user's system settings.
data.value: 智能暗黑模式，可根據用戶系統設定自動調整。

data.name: Smart dark mode that automatically adapts to the user's system settings.
data.value: 智能暗黑模式，可自動配合用戶的系統設定。

data.name: Start a new project
data.value: 開始新專案

data.name: Supports both environment variables and database-backed settings, with automatic priority given to environment variables for seamless overrides.
data.value: 支援環境變數及資料庫支援的設定，並自動優先使用環境變數以實現無縫覆蓋。

data.name: The navigation bar automatically adjusts based on user roles and permissions.
data.value: 導航欄會根據用戶角色和權限自動調整。

data.name: This is a template project, where we start the voyager...
data.value: 這是範本專案，我們將啟程探索者...

data.value: 歡迎
